task.title: Capture a Free-form Snip
task.shortdesc: In this section, you will learn to capture a snip using Free-form feature.

taskbody.prereq: Make sure Snipping Tool application is open.

step.cmd: Click New and select Free-form Snip option.
Draw a free-form shape around the object.

taskbody.result: You can view the captured image on the screen.
